name: adam-painter-booking-system
description: Full-stack painter booking system with smart prioritization, TypeScript, and MongoDB
author: Adam Painter Booking System

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "API,WEB" -c "blue,green" "cd api && yarn dev" "cd frontend && yarn dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd api && yarn build" "cd frontend && yarn build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd api && yarn install && cd ../frontend && yarn install
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd api && yarn clean" "cd frontend && yarn clean"
scripts.type-check: concurrently "cd api && yarn type-check" "cd frontend && yarn type-check"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd api && yarn lint" "cd frontend && yarn lint"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd api && yarn test" "cd frontend && yarn test"
